official_title: Comparative Effectiveness Trial of Care Delivery Strategies for HCC Screening Process Completion
inclusion_criteria:
* Adult patients (>21 years old)
* Documented cirrhosis
* Unrecognized cirrhosis
* An outpatient visit in year prior to randomization
* English or Spanish speaking
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 21 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* History of HCC
* History of liver transplantation
* Child Pugh C cirrhosis
* Significant comorbid conditions with life expectancy < 1 year, (e.g., extrahepatic malignancy)
